examples: We discuss current scientific advancements and discoveries in science class.
We discussed what punishment should be given to the boys.
We discussed our favorite movie scenes with our friends after watching a film.
The doctor made a call to the patient to discuss the test results.
The parents attended the school meeting to discuss their child's progress.
words.defineEn: to talk or have a discussion about something with someone
words.defineVi: để nói chuyện hoặc có một cuộc thảo luận về một cái gì đó với một ai đó

examples: The development of self-driving cars acts as a quantum jump in transportation, with the potential to reduce traffic and improve safety on the roads.
Europe has a well-developed transportation system.
When planning a trip, I always try to remember the saying 'beware of little expenses' and factor in all the smaller costs like transportation and food, as they can add up quickly.
Transportation broke down.
Transportation lock, remove first.
words.defineEn: a system or method for carrying people or goods from one place to another by cars, trains, etc.
words.defineVi: một hệ thống hoặc phương pháp vận chuyển người hoặc hàng hóa từ nơi này đến nơi khác bằng ô tô, tàu hỏa, v.v.

examples: To him, they were nothing more than a means to an end.
Allowing people to buy and own guns cuts both ways, as it can provide a means of self-defense but can also increase the risk of gun violence.
Imagine two criminals, partners in crime, who are arrested and placed in separate cells with no means of communication.
I didn't particularly like the job - it was just a means to an end.
I'd always lived within my means but my girlfriend was the opposite, so it was just a matter of time before we broke up.
words.defineEn: a way, system, object, etc. using which one can achieve a goal or accomplish a task
words.defineVi: một cách, hệ thống, đối tượng, v.v. sử dụng mà người ta có thể đạt được mục tiêu hoặc hoàn thành một nhiệm vụ

examples: See my car?
Our car has seen better days!
A car hit the barrier.
My father's car needs an oil change.
The car was doing 90 miles an hour.
words.defineEn: a road vehicle that has four wheels, an engine, and a small number of seats for people
words.defineVi: một phương tiện giao thông đường bộ có bốn bánh, một động cơ và một số ít chỗ ngồi cho người

examples: The twins have two bicycles.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
They are buying a new bicycle for their daughter's birthday.
He painted the bicycle, and now it's as good as new.
He wears a helmet for safety when riding his bicycle.
words.defineEn: a vehicle with two wheels that we ride by pushing its pedals with our feet
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có hai bánh mà chúng ta lái bằng cách dùng chân đẩy bàn đạp của nó

examples: It's a moped.
With more bikes, motorcycles, mopeds and scooters on the road, transportation experts say the moment is primed for a transit upheaval.
words.defineEn: a motorcycle with a weak engine and pedals
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe máy có động cơ và bàn đạp yếu

examples: The subway map helped me navigate the different lines.
I like reading a book during my subway ride.
I prefer taking the subway instead of driving in the city.
There are designated seats for elderly and pregnant passengers on the subway.
In 2012, each Subway franchise generated an average of $482,000 a year.
words.defineEn: an underground railway system, typically in a big city
words.defineVi: một hệ thống đường sắt ngầm, thường ở một thành phố lớn

examples: I spotted a beautiful vintage motorcycle at the bike show.
He rides his motorcycle to work every day.
She prefers the freedom and agility of a motorcycle over a car.
He wears a helmet for safety when riding his motorcycle.
He's saving up to buy a new motorcycle with better performance.
words.defineEn: a vehicle with two wheels, powered by an engine
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có hai bánh, chạy bằng động cơ

examples: Buses take priority over other vehicles on the road.
The bus hit the bridge.
The bus can take 60 passengers.
Buses to Oxford run every half hour.
A bus appeared around the corner.
words.defineEn: a large vehicle that carries many passengers by road
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe lớn chở nhiều hành khách bằng đường bộ

examples: The train’s here at long last.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
Trains between London and Brighton run throughout the day.
To hold the train.
The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
words.defineEn: a series of connected carriages or wagons pulled along a railroad line by a locomotive
words.defineVi: một loạt các toa xe hoặc toa xe được kết nối với nhau do đầu máy kéo dọc theo một tuyến đường sắt

examples: The taxi station is just a short walk from my apartment.
I took a taxi from my house to the train station.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
The taxi dropped me off at the entrance of the restaurant.
The taxi driver drove us to the airport quickly and safely.
words.defineEn: a car that has a driver who gets paid for taking people to places
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có tài xế được trả tiền để đưa mọi người đến những nơi

examples: We finally reached our destination.
The mountain is a popular destination for climbers and hikers.
Our dream destination for this year's vacation is a secluded tropical island.
The fast train arrived at the destination in no time.
The company's destination was to become a global leader in sustainable technology.
words.defineEn: the place where someone or something is headed
words.defineVi: nơi mà một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó đang đứng đầu

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: The students worked their heart and soul on their project.
Not working my foot.
Soymilk works well as a substitute for milk in sauces and creamy pasta dishes.
My dad works forty hours a week.
To work clay.
words.defineEn: something that we do regularly to earn money
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó mà chúng tôi làm thường xuyên để kiếm tiền

examples: The policeman hammered home the dangers of drinking and driving.
My son is coming home soon.
The forest is home to a diverse range of plant and animal species.
I pressed the issue home to them.
To hit a home run.
words.defineEn: the place that we live in, usually with our family
words.defineVi: nơi mà chúng tôi sống, thường là với gia đình của chúng tôi

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
The school took the full force of the explosion.
She left school at 16.
Many schools don’t take full advantage of the Internet.
The kids always work hard at school.
words.defineEn: a place where children learn things from teachers
words.defineVi: một nơi mà trẻ em học những điều từ giáo viên
